dialog.text: Great sync, everyone. I think we've really narrowed down the color of the 'Submit' button. Now, let's schedule a follow-up to finalize the shade of blue.
Can't we just do this over Slack? I have a major deployment on Wednesday.
No, we need 'alignment'. How does Tuesday at 9 AM look for everyone?
I'm traveling to a conference on Tuesday. I can do Monday at 7 PM?
Monday is a 'Mental Health Half-Day' for my department. So, no.
I have a class on Monday and Tuesday. I'm only here Wednesday and Thursday.
Okay, so Wednesday at 10 AM?
As I said, that's my deployment window. I literally cannot be there unless you want the site to crash.
We need your technical input on the blue, Bob. It's critical.
It's hex code #0000FF. There. I've provided my input.
Actually, my client says that blue feels 'too aggressive'. Can we look at Thursday?
Thursday works, but only between 11:15 and 11:45.
I have my lunch break then. Does that matter?
We can all just eat during the meeting! Let's call it a 'Lunch and Learn'.
I don't want to 'Learn' about a button color for an hour while I'm eating my salad.
Wait, I just realized I have a dentist appointment on Thursday. How about Friday?
Friday is 'Focus Friday'. No meetings allowed.
Actually, we moved 'Focus Friday' to 'Thoughtful Thursday', so Friday is open, but only in the afternoon.
I'm out on Friday. Taking a personal day to recover from this meeting.
Okay, let's circle back. How about we meet on Saturday morning?
Is that... legal?
Technically no, but we can call it a 'Voluntary Synergy Session'.
I'm going to lose my mind. I'm sending an email right now with five options. Just pick one.
But an email doesn't capture the 'vibe'. Let's just put a placeholder for next Tuesday at 9 AM and see who can make it.
I'll be in the air. Can I join from the plane?
Perfect! That's the spirit. I'll send out the invite for the meeting about the meeting right now.
I'm quitting. I'm actually quitting.
